headline: Bernstein Initiates Coverage of Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) with a Market Perform Rating, $24 PT
summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company (NYSE:HPE) is one of the best growth stocks under $30 to buy. On September 16, Bernstein initiated coverage of Hewlett Packard Enterprise with a Market Perform rating and $24 price target. Prior to this announcement, the company released its Q3 2025 earnings report, where the company’s total revenue reached $9.1 billion, […]
